nodes.description: A suicide bomber attempted to target a Secret Service Unit in central Kabul near the Afghan presidential palace.
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber apparently tried to target a Secret Service Unit in central Kabul, near the Afghan presidential palace.

nodes.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi condemned a terror attack in Kabul on Tuesday.
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday condemned a terror attack in the Afghanistan capital that left at least 28 people dead and hundreds injured.

nodes.description: The attack left at least 28 people dead and hundreds injured, many of whom were civilians.
nodes.support_text: The attack left at least 28 people dead and hundreds injured, many of whom were civilians.

nodes.description: Heavy gunfire by suspected Taliban militants followed the explosion.
nodes.support_text: The deafening explosion was followed by heavy gunfire by suspected Taliban militants.

edges.support_text: A suicide bomber apparently tried to target a Secret Service Unit in central Kabul, near the Afghan presidential palace.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday condemned a terror attack in the Afghanistan capital that left at least 28 people dead and hundreds injured.
The attack left at least 28 people dead and hundreds injured, many of whom were civilians.
